articles.author: Kevin Roose
articles.title: The 2019 Good Tech Awards
articles.description: It’s true! Some tech companies had a positive social impact this year.
articles.content: Pear Therapeutics, another Boston outfit, makes digital therapeutics essentially apps that use cognitive behavioral therapy techniques to help recovering addicts stick with their treatment programs. Its anti-opioid program, Reset-O, was cleared by the Food an… [+2607 chars]

articles.author: Abby Goodnough and Margot Sanger-Katz
articles.title: F.D.A. Failed to Ensure Safe Prescribing of Opioids, Documents Show
articles.description: The agency, whose oversight of opioid safety has largely eluded scrutiny, did not improve flawed programs designed to reduce addiction and overdoses.
articles.content: These drugs are prescribed for pain severe enough to require daily, around the clock, long term opioid treatment. But they have often been diverted for illicit use, with many people crushing and snorting or injecting them for a particularly potent, dangerous … [+1619 chars]

articles.author: Rachel L. Harris and Lisa Tarchak
articles.title: Yes, Our Writers Do Read Your Comments
articles.description: From “a gut punch” to a smile, our writers reflect on comments from some of their most-read columns of 2019.
articles.content:
Jackie in Missouri on Were Less and Less a Christian Nation, and I Blame Some Blowhards (Oct. 26):
Both of my daughters, a Gen-Xer and a Millennial, consider themselves pagan and think that Christianity is too hate-filled and bigoted. 
The Wiccan Rede, And … [+4527 chars]

articles.author: Nicholas Bakalar
articles.title: Long-Term Insecticide Exposure Tied to Heart Disease
articles.description: Pyrethroids, found in mosquito repellents, pet sprays and lice shampoos, may increase cardiovascular risks.
articles.content:
Prolonged exposure to a widely used household insecticide may increase the risk for cardiovascular disease and early death, new research suggests.
Pyrethrin and its synthetic derivatives are used in garden insecticides, pet sprays, mosquito repellents and li… [+798 chars]

articles.author: Caroline Catlin
articles.title: Seattle’s Foster Children Deserve Better
articles.description: Our most vulnerable children in Washington’s most populated county need safe spaces to heal.
articles.content: Of all the children I cared for, I had a soft spot for one child, a preteen. She howled during silent reading, stole fruit snacks from the kitchen and invented creative insults such as changing my name to Poopaline. She was as intelligent, caring and awkward … [+1425 chars]
